item.description: Dancing to the band Joe's Attic!! This is the group that beat out Four on the Floor to become the WROR's "House Band"....not sure how good they are but we always make our own good time anyway. Meet around 7:30 to help gather tables along the back and grab a bite and some good conversation before the music begins around 9. This evening's organizer is Karen Jackson...please take a look at who's attending and watch for folks, usually gathering at tables along the back wall. Sorry I will not be able to make it but I am sure everyone will have a fun. Please watch for others and introduce yourself, this is a really friendly group, :-) Sandy

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dancing at the Station
